flo-legal-embed.label: Choose an Embedded Flo Legal
flo-legal-embed.description: Saves the unique identifier of the selected form in the database.
flo-legal-embed.disabled.placeholder: This field is disabled until necessary settings are configured.
flo-legal-embed.disabled.hint: Ensure FLO_LEGAL_API_URL and FLO_LEGAL_API_TOKEN are configured to enable this field.
